import React from 'react' import { Card, CardBody } from 'reactstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './tour-card.css' const TourCard = ({ tour }) => { const { id, title, city, photo, price, featured, reviews } = tour const totalRating = reviews?. return (
{ featured && Featured}
{city} {avgRating} ({reviews.length})
{title}
{price}.000.000/1 người
) } export default TourCard
